DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if a single or repeat intra-articular injection of Gel-200 is safe and effective in subjects with symptomatic osteoarthritis of the knee and to determine if original SI-6606/01 Gel-200 therapy is durable beyond the original study.
DOC.brief_title: Gel-200 Extension and Open-Label Study in Osteoarthritis of the Knee
DOC.criteria: Previous participation in study SI6606/01. Female subjects who are pregnant or lactating.
